title: Building Applications on EKS Cassandra
description:
Ready to take your application development to the next level? Join Aaron Ploetz on Dec 17 for a live session where you’ll learn how to seamlessly build and deploy scalable, resilient applications using Apache Cassandra® on Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) and Elastic Kubernetes Service (EKS).

This hands-on webinar is designed for developers, architects, and IT professionals who want to unlock the full potential of Cassandra and AWS-managed services.

Here’s what you’ll take away:

--Step-by-step guidance: Learn how to build a simple application with the Java version of the DataStax Data API.
--Practical deployment tips: See how to deploy Cassandra-driven applications on Amazon ECS with ease.
--Best practices for scalability: Discover how to leverage Cassandra for modern, cloud-native app development.
____________________

Stay in touch:
- Join our Discord Community: https://discord.gg/datastax
- Follow us on X: https://x.com/DataStaxDevs

_________
